title: (x) VAG Rounded / Chevin / Isonorm alike - Typ1451 {Simon H}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128100337im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ws_5871.gif)

I thought it was a Lineto typeface - but it’s not  
Any ideas

 [‹ (x) Vintage serif caps on "Sweeney Todd" movie poster - Goldburg {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128100337/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39422 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Sun newspaper logo, headlines and body text ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128100337/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39412 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Skygge

comments.content: Are you sure - really looks a lot like their “Typ1451”.

It is, sorry...  
I’m truly embarrassed
Nothing to be sorry about at all - quite a few of their typefaces look similar.
